revision.text:
{{Infobox company | name = fluid Operations AG | type = [[Aktiengesellschaft (Deutschland)|Aktiengesellschaft]] | products = eCloudManager, Information Workbench | logo = Fops logo-mid.png | foundation = 2008 | location_city = [[Walldorf]] | location_country = [[Germany]] | industry = [[Cloud Computing]], [[Semantic technology]] | homepage = {{URL|http://www.fluidOps.com|fluidOps.com}} }}
The German software company '''fluid Operations AG''' was founded in 2008 and is specialised in cloud management and [[semantic technology]]. fluid Operations' product portfolio includes the eCloudManager and the Information Workbench. Additionally, fluid Operations offers an [[Open-source software|open source software]], the [[Virtual Machine File System|VMFS]] Driver.<ref name="VMFS">[[VMware VMFS|VMFS Driver]]</ref>
==Research== In the NewProt <ref>[http://swift.cmbi.ru.nl/gv/newprot/ NewProt Project Website]. Retrieved 2013-01-07.</ref> project, fluid Operations developed an interactive Self-Service Portal for [[protein engineering]] software and databases with partners. This project is funded by the [[European Union]] and started in 2011. Furthermore, fluid Operations participates in the Optique <ref>[http://www.optique-project.eu/ Optique Project Website]. Retrieved 2013-01-07.</ref> project which is funded by the [[Framework Programmes for Research and Technological Development|Seventh Framework Programme]] of the [[European Union|EU]]. The main goal of the Optique project is the development of a scalable end-user access to [[big data]]. Project partners are the [[University of Oxford]],<ref>[http://www.cs.ox.ac.uk/isg/projects/Optique/ Optique project description of the University of Oxford] Retrieved 2013-01-07</ref> the [[Technical University of Hamburg]], the [[National and Kapodistrian University of Athens]], the [[Sapienza University of Rome]] and the [[Free University of Bozen-Bolzano]], as well as the companies [[Siemens]] and [[Statoil]].
==Awards== * fluid Operations AG: [[Gartner]] Cool Vendor in the SAP Ecosystem Report 2010 * Information Workbench ''Conference Explorer'': Linked Data-a-Thon 2011 <ref>[//www.perspektive-mittelstand.de/fluid-Operations-gewinnt-Linked-Data-a-Thon-auf-der-ISWC-2011/pressemitteilung/47304.html fluid Operations wins Linked Data-a-Thon at the ISWC 2011]. Retrieved 2013-01-07.</ref> at the [[International Semantic Web Conference|ISWC]]. 2nd Place at the WWW Metadata Challenge 2012.<ref name="WWW Metadata Challenge 2012">[//www.emse.fr/~zimmermann/Metadata/results-award.pdf Results of the WWW Metadata Challenge 2012]. Retrieved 2013-01-07.</ref> * fluid Operations AG: Winner of the [[:de:Computerwoche|Computerwoche]] Best in Cloud Award 2012 in the category [[Cloud computing|Infrastructure as a Service - Private Cloud]]<ref>[http://www.computerwoche.de/a/best-in-cloud-2012,2527258,6 Winner IaaS - Private Cloud: fluid Operations AG]. Retrieved 2013-01-07.</ref>
== Further reading == * Dieter Fensel: ''Foundations for the Web of Information and Services – A Review of 20 Years of Semantic Web Research'' Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg, Innsbruck 2011, ISBN 978-3-642-19797-0.
